title: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority Act, 1999

provisions.part: Part I – Establishment and functions of the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority
provisions.title: Establishment of the Authority
provisions.content: (1) There is established by this Act a body corporate to be known as the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority in this Act referred to as “the Authority”. provisions.part: Part I – Establishment and functions of the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority
provisions.title: Object of the Authority
provisions.content: The object of the Authority is to promote good driving standards in the country; and ensure the use of road worthy vehicles on the roads and in other public places. The object of the Authority is to promote good driving standards in the country; and ensure the use of road worthy vehicles on the roads and in other public places.
